Text: Y'know Darnell, as much as I rightfully give you shit for contributing literally nothing, it's still... kinda nice just having you around.
What you lack in combat prowess is somewhat made up for by the fact that I at least have an ally present, I think.
I'd probably go a bit nuts if it were just me and those weird German kids.
Pico... I knew you secretly appreciated my epic commentary...
Don't let it get to your head.
